summary: A woman lures emotionally crippled men into affairs, then helps them repair their lives.
cast: Sandy Dennis|Anthony Newley|Theodore Bikel|Burr DeBenning|Sandy Baron|Marj Dusay|Martin West|Virginia Vincent|King Moody|Robert Gibbons|Robert Cleaves|Francis De Sales|Monty Margetts|George Winters|Paul King|Norma Jean Kron|Mike Lally|Packy McFarland
title: Dulce noviembre
